fields.name: Prevent Disaster (Passive):
fields.value: You will absorb all attacks committed on Town members, except the weakest, with 3.0x defense power. In other words, as long as you are alive, it is hard for more than one town player to die per night.

fields.name: Distribute Medical Kit (1x, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Your target will receive a one-time-use defensive vest which grants 0.5x additional defense power. Use of the vest does not consume their night action. You may not self-target.

fields.name: Evacuate! (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. All visits to town players tonight will fail silently.
